After eating a lot of meat, I really wanted vegetables. I convinced my husband that we should try this place out and I'm so glad we did!  The juices were fresh and delicious.  For dinner we shared a large cesar salad and a vegetable risotto.  Both were delicious and the portions were perfect for us. I wish we had room to try out one of their desserts though.   The ambiance here is trendy and green.  They have free wifi!
